entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20.
